messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Mike Wadibidowski. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod One.
